entry.content:
Two cooking questions:
1. I like to fry my egg in bacon grease, but the bacon cools while the egg cooks. Anyone have a good way to keep the bacon warm without getting soggy?
2. Why do fatty hamburger patties not shrink when you make a thumb indentation in them?
